panels.description: The number of hosts currently configured to be monitored.
panels.title: Hosts

panels.description:
The percentage of monitored hosts.

A monitored host is a host with at least one responding connector.
panels.title: Coverage

panels.description: The total number of hosts per type: compute (server), storage and network.
panels.title: Host Types

panels.description: The hosts distribution per manufacturer.
panels.title: Hosts Vendors

panels.description: The average of the Power Usage Effectiveness over 2 hours.
panels.title: PUE

panels.description: The average of the Power Usage Effectiveness over 24 hours.
panels.title: PUE (24 hrs)

panels.description: The total number of CPUs currently monitored.
panels.title: CPUs

panels.description: The total number of connected network cards.
panels.title: Connected NICs

panels.description: The total disk space in the site.
panels.title: Disk Space

panels.description: The total volume of network transfers in the site.
panels.title: Network Tx

panels.description: The CO₂ electricity emissions, as provided in the configuration file.
panels.title: CO₂ Intensity

panels.description: Electricity cost, as provided in the configuration file.
panels.title: Electricity Cost

panels.description:
The site's current power usage multiplied by the site's PUE.

This number represents the site's actual power usage. It takes into account the cooling and other overhead that supports the equipment.
panels.title: Total Power * PUE

panels.description:
The site's current power usage multiplied by the site's PUE, displayed as a graph.

This number represents the actual power usage of a data center. It takes into account the cooling and other overhead that supports the equipment.
panels.title: Total Power * PUE

panels.description: Today's power consumption for the site.
panels.title: Today's Live Consumption

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for the site in the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Daily Consumption

panels.description:
The overall energy cost reported for the site during the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Daily Cost

panels.description:
The overall volume of CO₂ emitted by the site during the last 24 hours.

If less than 24 hours of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Daily CO₂ Emissions

panels.description: The total current power consumption of all the hosts in the site.
panels.title: Total Power

panels.description: Today's power cost for the site.
panels.title: Today's Live Cost

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for the site during the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Monthly Consumption

panels.description:
The overall energy cost reported for the site during the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Monthly Cost

panels.description:
The overall volume of CO₂ emitted by the site during the last 30 days.

If less than 30 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on the past collected data.
panels.title: Monthly CO₂ Emissions

panels.description:
The percentage of possible deviation from an exact power consumption value.

This value is based on the collected data of monitored hosts reporting power consumption and estimated values for hosts not reporting their power consumption.

When the power consumed by a host cannot be read, Hardware Sentry estimates this value based on the typical consumption of a host's components (CPUs, disks, network interfaces, etc.).

targets.expr: (sum(hw_host_power_watts{quality="estimated", site="$site"} * 15) + sum(hw_host_power_watts{quality="measured", site="$site"} * 5) + 10000 * (sum(present_over_time(metricshub_host_configured{site="$site"}[1h])) - (count(max by (host_id) (metricshub_connector_status{state="ok", site="$site"} == 1))))) / (sum(hw_host_power_watts{site="$site"}) + 100 * (sum(present_over_time(metricshub_host_configured{site="$site"}[1h])) - (count(max by (host_id) (metricshub_connector_status{state="ok", site="$site"} == 1)))))

panels.title: Margin of Error

panels.description: Today's volume of CO₂ emissions for the site.
panels.title: Today's Live CO₂ Emissions

panels.description:
The overall power consumption reported for the site during the last year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Yearly Consumption

panels.description:
The overall energy cost reported for the site in the past year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Yearly Cost

panels.description:
The overall volume of CO₂ emitted by the site during the past year.

If less than 365 days of data is available, this value is estimated based on past collected data.
panels.title: Yearly CO₂ Emissions

panels.description:
The number of degrees Celsius (°C) remaining before the temperature of a host in the site reaches its closest warning temperature threshold.

It is advised to keep the heating margin above 5°C.
panels.title: Heating Margin

panels.description: The percentage of hosts for which temperature readings are reported.
panels.title: Monitoring Confidence

panels.description: The lowest host's heating margin of all hosts in the site.
panels.title: Site Heating Margin

panels.description: The estimation of the site's temperature based on the ambient temperature of all hosts in the site.
panels.title: Current Site Temperature

panels.description:
The estimated energy consumption cuts based on the current power consumption, heating margin, site temperature and recommended site temperature.

If the recommended site temperature is lower than the current site temperature, this number may be negative.
panels.title: Potential Yearly Energy Savings

panels.description:
The number of hosts according to their heating margin.

The abscissa shows the heating margin.
The ordinate represents the number of hosts  for a given heating margin.
panels.title: Heating Margin Host Distribution

panels.description:
The estimated yearly savings based on the current power consumption, heating margin, site temperature and recommended site temperature.

If the recommended site temperature is lower than the current site temperature, this number may be negative.
panels.title: Potential Yearly Savings

panels.description: The recommended site temperature based on the site's current heating margin, as well as the current and past site temperatures.
panels.title: Recommended Max Site Temperature

panels.description:
The estimated CO₂ emissions reduction based on the current power consumption, heating margin, site temperature and recommended site temperature.

If the recommended site temperature is lower than the current site temperature, this number may be negative.
panels.title: Potential Yearly CO₂ Reduction

panels.description: The site's daily energy consumption for the past 30 days, as reported.
panels.title: Daily Energy Consumption (last 30 days)

panels.description: Time since the collect of data by Hardware Sentry was first started for the site.
panels.title: Collect Started
